name: NSCollectionLayoutContainer
desc: A protocol used to provide information about the size and content insets of a layout's container.

items.name: var contentSize: CGSize
items.desc: The size of the container before content insets are applied.

items.name: var effectiveContentSize: CGSize
items.desc: The size of the container after content insets are applied.

items.name: var contentInsets: NSDirectionalEdgeInsets
items.desc: The amount of space added around the content of the container to adjust its final size.

items.name: var effectiveContentInsets: NSDirectionalEdgeInsets
items.desc: The amount of space added around the content of the container to adjust its final size after item content insets are applied.
